title: Windows 8.1 Pro and Core - 32 and 64 bit - MSDN build 9600
description:
Description:
From Facebook to the full-featured Mail app and modern Outlook to a "peek" bar in the modern version of Internet Explorer 11 to the new Windows Scan app to the new Bing logo, you now get nearly all of the promised Windows 8.1 extras. 
The Start button is back, you can boot to the desktop and use the same image for your Start screen as your desktop background. SkyDrive is built in to sync files - on both Windows 8.1 and Windows 8.1 RT - as well as settings and the layout for your Start screen and desktop taskbar.

Installation:
1.	Burn a DVD or Copy to USB Storage and boot from it
2.	Use your original key for Windows 8/8.1, choose the correct version you have license for (Windows 8.1 or 8.1 Pro). You can find generic key, so you can install Windows from here.
3.	Activator (KMS Activation for "the pirates": KMSPico v9.0.3.20131026

System requirements:
1Ghz+ CPU
1 GB+ ram for 32 bit and 2 GB+ for 64 bit
16 GB+ free space for 32bit and 20GB+ for 64bit.
Video card that supports at least DX9 and WDDM 1.0

If you like this product please buy it from MS Corporaions website!!!
